backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining data models, storage maps, and initial state for user profiles, transactions, savings goals, AI predictions, blog posts, and related features.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to file changes, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing functionality of various frontend pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint setting metadata, favicons, SEO tags, and structured data for the FinanceWise AI site.
frontend/netlify.toml: Netlify config defining build settings, redirects, headers, and caching rules for the frontend.
frontend/public/_headers: Custom headers configuration ensuring correct content type and caching for ads.txt.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rules ensuring ads.txt is served directly and all other routes resolve to index.html.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Publisher configuration file for Google AdSense authorization.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon with finance-themed icon elements including currency symbols and growth arrow.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app root defining routing, authentication checks, query client setup, and profile setup dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Displays an access-denied screen prompting users to log in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AIChatbot.tsx: Implements an AI-powered chat interface with message handling, visual insights, and context-aware response processing.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the authenticated app layout with navigation, user profile handling, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/CookieConsent.ts: Shows a cookie consent banner for unauthenticated users and manages consent storage with expiry.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, social icons, and grouped resource sections.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the public-facing header with navigation, authentication buttons, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/content/defaultBlogPosts.ts: Defines default blog post metadata for initial content population.
frontend/src/content/defaultQuizQuestion: Defines an array of default quiz questions with answers, explanations, tips, topics, and difficulty levels.
frontend/src/content/staticProblemSoluti: Provides a static list of finance problem-solution blog entries for direct rendering on the blog page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrency.ts: Provides currency conversion and formatting utilities based on user preferences and predefined exchange rates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDefaultContentInit: Implements a mock initialization mutation that triggers cache invalidation and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOptimizedQueries.t: Empty placeholder file for future optimized query logic.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerformance.ts: Empty placeholder file for future performance-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains a large set of React Query hooks for user profiles, preferences, transactions, goals, blogs, quizzes, chat, and related serialization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and custom scrollbars and transitions.
frontend/src/lib/blog/blogContentCache.t: Implements localStorage-based caching for blog HTML content with expiration handling and utilities to load, save, and clear cache entries.
frontend/src/lib/blog/generateAdsenseArt: Generates deterministic AdSense-friendly financial articles by deriving a topic from metadata and building structured HTML content with sections and word count.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/budgetLo: Calculates a full budget plan including income, expenses, recommended savings, rule-based allocations, assumptions, and cash flow metrics.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/healthSc: Computes a financial health score using savings rate, cash flow, emergency fund, debt ratio, and planning factors, producing a brief explanation.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/progress: Calculates completion progress based on weighted required and optional fields.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/recommen: Generates personalized budgeting recommendations and an action plan based on spending patterns, savings, and financial inputs.
frontend/src/lib/budget-planner/reminder: Builds an ICS calendar file for scheduled budget reminders with event metadata and alarms.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides currency conversion, formatting utilities, symbol/name helpers, and a stub for retrieving the current currency.
Implements a deterministic rule-based finance assistant with query classification, vagueness detection, clarifying prompts, and templated responses.
frontend/src/lib/quizProgressStorage.ts: Manages quiz progress in localStorage, including loading, saving, clearing, and updating question/answer state.
frontend/src/lib/serialization.ts: Provides serialization utilities for converting between Motoko and JS types, including BigInt handling and data structure normalization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Shows mission, vision, and values of FinanceWise AI using descriptive cards and layout.
frontend/src/pages/AIInsights.tsx: Displays financial insights, charts, and ML model predictions based on user transactions, balance, and savings goals.
frontend/src/pages/AITransparency.tsx: Explains the system’s AI models and capabilities in a user-facing transparency page.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Analytics dashboard showing spending trends, category breakdowns, and forms to add income/expense transactions using charts and data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Benefits.tsx: Static marketing page listing key benefits of the FinanceWise AI platform with styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/BlogAdmin.tsx: Admin page for initializing default blog posts and quiz content, gated by Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPost.tsx: Renders a single blog article by slug with loading, not-found handling, and formatted article display.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPlanner.tsx: Interactive budget planning tool that collects income/expense data, computes progress, and generates personalized budget plans.
frontend/src/pages/CAFeatures.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Calculators.tsx: Authenticated financial calculators for SIP, lumpsum, FIRE, and tax computations with input forms and result outputs.
frontend/src/pages/Challenges.tsx: Renders a daily challenges interface with predefined tasks, allowing completing, skipping, or swapping challenges.
frontend/src/pages/Compare.tsx: Displays a side‑by‑side feature comparison between FinanceWise AI and other tools.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Provides contact details and a form that submits user inquiries via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/CookiePolicy.tsx: Shows the site's cookie usage details, covering types of cookies and their purposes.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerCare.tsx: Offers customer support info and a contact form that submits messages to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays financial analytics, charts, and transaction management using multiple backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/DeploymentInfo.tsx: Empty or missing component with no rendered content.
frontend/src/pages/Disclaimer.tsx: Renders a detailed disclaimer page with multiple sections explaining educational purpose, lack of financial advice, and user responsibilities.
frontend/src/pages/DNSCheck.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/ExpenseLog.tsx: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Displays a FAQ page using an accordion layout populated with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/Features.tsx: Shows a grid of feature cards highlighting the app’s core capabilities with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceBlog.tsx: Renders a blog listing page that displays problem-solution style finance articles from static content.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceDisclaimer.tsx: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceQuiz.tsx: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/FinancialWellness.tsx: Displays wellness-related informational cards focused on emotional, psychological, and security aspects of financial health.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Provides a full CRUD interface for managing savings goals, including dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting goals with backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/GoalTracker.tsx: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature list, stats, and navigation buttons for signup and learning more.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorks.tsx: Explains the step-by-step user journey with cards detailing each stage of using the app.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentCalculators: Empty placeholder for investment calculator tools.
frontend/src/pages/Investments.tsx: Empty placeholder for investments overview or management page.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Empty placeholder for a leaderboard or ranking feature.
frontend/src/pages/LearnFinance.tsx: Empty placeholder for a finance learning resource page.
frontend/src/pages/Learning.tsx: Displays quiz statistics, progress tracking, topics, and achievements for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/LearningStockMarket.t: Empty placeholder for stock market learning content.
frontend/src/pages/Legal.tsx: Empty placeholder for legal information page.
frontend/src/pages/LegalHub.tsx: Empty placeholder for legal document hub or overview.
frontend/src/pages/LoansEMI.tsx: Empty placeholder for loan or EMI calculator page.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity authentication with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyPsychology.tsx: Interactive financial psychology assessment generating personalized results based on user responses.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, security, and retention details.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders a detailed privacy policy page using cards and sections describing data collection and usage.
frontend/src/pages/public/Home.tsx: Public home page component with hero section, feature grid, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/Quiz.tsx: Implements the authenticated quiz experience with question fetching, answer submission, feedback, and initialization logic.
frontend/src/pages/Resources.tsx: Displays categorized financial resources with navigation actions and a grid of resource cards.
frontend/src/pages/Roadmap.tsx: Shows completed and upcoming product features using cards in a roadmap layout.
frontend/src/pages/Security.tsx: Presents security features in styled cards highlighting encryption, blockchain storage, and privacy protections.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityPrivacy.tsx: Provides authenticated users with security status details and privacy controls including toggles and device info.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders a settings page allowing authenticated users to view profile info and update preferences such as theme, notifications, analytics, and currency.
frontend/src/pages/StockMarketGame.tsx: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Displays the app’s Terms & Conditions with structured sections covering rules, liabilities, and legal policies.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Provides a styled Terms & Conditions page with detailed usage rules, permitted activities, and restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/Transactions.tsx: Implements a full transaction management page with search, edit, delete, filtering, and form dialogs for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/Updates.tsx: Shows recent version updates and a roadmap list with planned features and improvements.
frontend/src/pages/UseCases.tsx: Renders a list of financial use cases, each with descriptions and scenarios for different user types.
frontend/src/pages/UserGuidelines.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented logic or UI.
frontend/src/requirements/REQ-10-quiz-no: Requirement file stating the quiz system must remain unchanged with no new questions or modifications.
frontend/src/types/backend-types.ts: Type definitions mirroring backend data structures including users, transactions, goals, AI predictions, blogs, and quizzes.
frontend/src/types/budget-planner.ts: Interfaces defining budget planner inputs and generated budget plan structures.
frontend/src/types/local-types.ts: Re-exports selected backend-derived types for frontend use.
frontend/src/types/transaction.ts: Local transaction interface defining fields for on-chain transaction data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, animations, and plugins.
frontend/vercel.json: Vercel deployment config defining build commands, environment variables, rewrites, and security headers.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, issues, and pending requests.
unknown.txt: Outlines expected performance improvements, monitoring tools, optimization timeline, load-testing recommendations, and key success metrics for a frontend and backend performance plan. Provides concrete targets for latency, rendering times, and testing scenarios.
